name: Into the Zombie World War
description:
LAUNCH SALE - 50% OFF
Sometimes your only chance to survive is to rush into the hordes of bloodthirsty zombies!

Experience the true horrors of trying to survive in a merciless world swarmed with the Dead!
Avoid them, outsmart them or shoot them in the head! But with their increasing numbers and such limited means your future looks grim. Will you dare to pick up your weapon once more and reveal the secrets this dark world holds?

FEATURES:
- Many different WEAPONS with dynamic animations and sounds!
- Useful UPGRADES like GRANADES and HEALTH KITS!
- Stunning PHOTOREALISTIC GRAPHICS!
- Realistic GUN MOVEMENT!
- 3D SCOPE for SNIPER RIFLE and 3D AIM for other weapons!
- DYNAMIC and ADDICTIVE gameplay!
